Is Your Facility Prepared for Emergencies??
Get the Solutions and Planning Support You Need to Help Stay Prepared for Natural Disasters and More.
888.263.3423 (888-2-OFFICE)
My AccountTechnologyFurnitureInk & TonerPaperOffice Supplies
Emergencies Are Serious Business.
Get the resources your healthcare facility needs to help prepare for them.
Natural disasters. Civil disruptions. Epidemics and outbreaks. You might not know when an emergency will strike, but you can be prepared when it does.
Working as your partner, Office Depot® will help you prepare your healthcare facility’s emergency contingency plan and equip you with the products you need to take quick and effective action when necessary.
Free preparedness assessment Easy and convenient emergency solutions
Look to us as a disaster relief solutions provider that delivers the emergency plans and products that help supply safety, confidence and comfort when you need them most.
There’s never been a better time to partner with Office Depot.
For more information, contact your Office Depot sales representative at [email here] or by phone at [phone here].
